repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals Publications

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals

did.abstract: Publications of the Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes copies of 1974, 1975, and 1976 convention programs, copy of a paper submitted by Wilson Hart for the 1974 convention, copies of papers submitted at the 1975 convention other than those printed in Public Personnel Management. These include remarks by Fibish, Freehling, Chaskelson, Tobias, Reuben and Black.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals Publications #5532. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: By Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals (SFLRP). Febraury 19-20, 1976. 3 copies. Item is in English.
